networknotice-desc: Allows staff to create more full featured site notices, network wide.
networknotice-create-notice-desc: Creates network notices (site notices) that can be displayed network wide, with more features than standard site notices.
networknotice-create-notice-label-helper: Describe the notice, for browsing current notices in the DB.
networknotice-create-notice-text-helper: e.g. "Watch out for that shifty salle[] character".  Supports HTML.
networknotice-create-notice-namespace-he: e.g. "Special" or "User" or leave empty for all.
networknotice-create-notice-wiki-helper: e.g. "dota2" or leave empty for all.
networknotice-create-notice-category-hel: e.g. "players" or leave empty for all.
networknotice-create-notice-prefix-helpe: e.g. "The International/" or leave empty to ignore.
networknotice-create-notice-action-helpe: e.g. "MovePage" or "Delete" leave empty to ignore.
